title: One good reason
creator_credit: Film Australia, Roland Beckett and Donald Crombie
brief_description: An examination of the reactions of a career army man who is considering resigning to take advantage of an attractive offer to join a commercial organisation. Stars Bill Hunter as Major Archer.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Roland Beckett and Donald Crombie
